metadata.title: CVE-2020-12667 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Knot Resolver before 5.1.1 allows traffic amplification via a crafted DNSanswer from an attacker-controlled server, aka an "NXNSAttack" issue. Thisis triggered by random subdomains in the NSDNAME in NS records.

criterions.comment: knot-resolver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
